sections.body: During Combat The sorcerer casts shield, targets approaching enemies with acidic ray, then uses her long limbs ability to deliver touch spells. In melee, she casts enlarge person on herself and attacks with her spear.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The tainted sorcerer's mind and body have been warped by alien or extraplanar magic.
